MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA3 postcode area of Paisley, affecting properties in Love Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:37am. Our engineers have arrived onsite near Wallace Street to investigate the fault and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:45pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:40am on the 29th of January 2021
